projectDesc.p: The Cologne Digital Sanskrit Lexicon (CDSL) project undertakes to digitize and merge all published Sanskrit dictionaries. Its aim is to create a basic lexical corpus that provides easy access to all available meanings of Sanskrit words and allows the creation of a number of computer programs that will help to analyze Sanskrit texts.

This material is based upon work supported by the National Endowment for the Humanities under Grant No. HG-50022-10. Any views, findings, conclusions, or recommendations expressed in this material do not necessarily represent those of the National Endowment for the Humanities.
